name: Astoria Legends: Red Moon
storyline: Each year on the eve of the Red Moon, the Astrals call forth their Envoys and summons to the world the Tower of God. The arrival of the Tower of God also heralds the oncoming Judgement and brings fear and death upon those caught within its domain. Follow the Envoy of Fire, Astor Roen, as he descends upon Marcalaan and sets the city in chaos... for as long as he keeps his pacts to the gods alive, his home will be safe.
summary:
Each year on the eve of the Red Moon, the Astrals call forth their Envoys and summons to the world the Tower of God. The arrival of the Tower of God also heralds the oncoming Judgement and brings fear and death upon those caught within its domain. Follow the Envoy of Fire, Astor Roen, as he descends upon Marcalaan and sets the city in chaos... for as long as he keeps his pacts to the gods alive, his home will be safe.

Astoria Legends: Red Moon is a 2D Character action game set to launch on the Nintendo Switch in 2022.
